Fun game to play with friends and other ppl. Fun too for challenging self to learn new thing to win. Many nostalgic characters making this more fun. :D

Spooky hide n seek. Fun to play with friends, sometimes fun without depends on the people you get paired with Definitely some toxicity in the community as with most games.
Playing killer is hit n miss when you're low rank. Sometimes you get paired with red ranks and it's extremely difficult to do anything. Definitely need to practice to be good at killer or you'll just straight up get bullied.
Buggy, but still fun.
